backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with story, user, and profile types, storage mixins, and seeded stories.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function converting old user profiles to new ones with displayName and username.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file configuring PWA metadata, icons, and root app mount.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining name, icons, theme colors, orientation, and categories.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling install, activation, caching, and fetch strategies for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up global app layout, routing, splash screen, service worker, and conditional layouts for story and premium pages.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Renders a placeholder ad unless the user is premium or in preview mode, with a button linking to the premium page.
frontend/src/components/AppButton.tsx: Custom button wrapper enforcing consistent variant and size styling around shadcn UI Button.
frontend/src/components/AppDrawer.tsx: Side drawer menu providing navigation links, premium CTA, and error‑handled routing.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Top header with menu button, centered logo, and user avatar with fallback behavior.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with active‑state highlighting and safe navigation handling.
frontend/src/components/ButtonStyleRegre: Dev‑only widget rendering various button variants to detect styling regressions.
frontend/src/components/CategoryScroller: Horizontally scrollable category list that navigates to category detail pages.
frontend/src/components/ContinueReadingC: Displays the user’s last-read story with progress and links back to the story reader.
frontend/src/components/DailyStoryNotifi: Dismissible 24‑hour notification banner for daily featured story alerts.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: Shows a PWA install prompt banner with install and dismiss actions when the app is installable.
frontend/src/components/InterstitialAdMo: Displays a timed interstitial ad modal unless the user is premium or in preview mode.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Provides a dropdown to select the app’s language from supported options.
frontend/src/components/LegalSupportPage: Layout wrapper for legal/support pages with a back button and footer branding.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles login/logout via Internet Identity and updates UI based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/ModeToggle.tsx: Switches between adults and kids content modes using preference settings.
frontend/src/components/MyStoryCard.tsx: Displays a user’s story card with cover, details, and actions to edit or read.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Manages a three‑step onboarding flow for language, mode, and theme, persisting preferences and supporting skip.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/StepT: Wraps onboarding steps with direction‑aware enter animations, disabling motion when preferred.
frontend/src/components/PageLayout.tsx: Generic page layout providing max-width container, spacing, and optional title.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Renders a premium badge in multiple style variants.
Popover with controls for font size, reading background, and auto-scroll preferences.
frontend/src/components/ReminderBanner.t: Shows a reminder banner based on local reminder logic with dismiss handling.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Guards content behind authentication and shows a login prompt when needed.
frontend/src/components/RouteErrorFallba: Fallback page for routing errors with a message and button to return home.
frontend/src/components/ShareSheetPlaceh: Provides share or copy-link functionality with Web Share API fallback and feedback.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Full-screen splash view showing app icon, name, taglines, and loading indicator.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Displays a story card with title, summary, cover, metadata, and favorite toggle, navigating to the story on click.
frontend/src/components/StoryCardSkeleto: Shows a skeleton placeholder layout mimicking a story card while content loads.
frontend/src/components/TopBanner.tsx: Renders a dismissible top banner with variants, optional icon, title, and description.
Provides a banner offering placeholder translation with a button, switching to a notice after activation.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Displays a user avatar with image, initials fallback, optional loading overlay, and size variants.
Stores and persists user UI preferences with localStorage and syncs them to backend user state when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUser.ts: Combines guest and authenticated user state, syncing to the backend, handling optimistic premium updates, and storing notification prefs.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Manages favorite stories with React Query and localStorage, supporting both authenticated users via backend calls and guests via client-side storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyStories.ts: Fetches the authenticated user’s stories via backend if supported, otherwise returns an empty list.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDownloads.t: Handles offline story downloads using localStorage, supporting save, remove, fetch, and download-state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects and subscribes to the browser's prefers-reduced-motion setting.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Manages the PWA install prompt lifecycle, including showing, dismissing, and cooldown tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useReadingHistory.ts: Tracks reading history and progress for both authenticated users and guests, storing data in user state or localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Provides various story-fetching hooks with seeded fallbacks, filtering, language/mode handling, and backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useStoryEditor.ts: Offers story loading and a placeholder save function, currently blocking creation with a 'coming soon' error.
frontend/src/hooks/useStorySocial.ts: Manages story likes and comments using local storage–backed social data utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React hook that loads authenticated or guest user profile data, exposes derived profile info, and provides a mutation for saving profile changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining color variables, dark mode theming, focus styles, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/covers.ts: Maps story categories to cover image URLs with separate handling for kid‑friendly categories.
frontend/src/lib/engagement.ts: Manages engagement metrics in localStorage, including streaks, badges, shares, and bonus unlocks.
frontend/src/lib/fonts.ts: Returns the appropriate font class name based on the selected UI language.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Defines supported UI languages and translation strings for app interface text.
frontend/src/lib/kidsMode.ts: Provides helpers to determine kid‑safe categories and filter category lists based on kids mode.
frontend/src/lib/logOnce.ts: Logs warnings or errors only once per session using a keyed cache.
frontend/src/lib/notifications.ts: Utilities for checking notification support, requesting permission, and sending a test notification.
frontend/src/lib/onboarding.ts: Manages onboarding completion state via localStorage with helpers to check, set, and reset it.
frontend/src/lib/profileValidation.ts: Validates usernames and image inputs for profile editing with size, type, and format checks.
frontend/src/lib/readingProgress.ts: Stores, loads, clears, and computes reading progress data per story using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/reminders.ts: Manages reminder settings in localStorage and determines when to show reminders based on a 24‑hour interval.
frontend/src/lib/seededStories.ts: Provides seeded fallback stories and utilities for filtering by kids mode and selecting local cover images by category.
frontend/src/lib/share.ts: Implements app and story sharing via Web Share API with clipboard fallbacks and standardized share result handling.
frontend/src/lib/storyDraft.ts: Validates story draft input, calculates word count and read time, and stores per‑story tags in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storyLanguage.ts: Maps UI languages to backend language enums and retrieves appropriate story content with translation checks.
frontend/src/lib/storySocialStorage.ts: Stores likes and comments for stories in localStorage with helpers to read, update, and toggle like overlays.
frontend/src/lib/translatePlaceholder.ts: Generates placeholder translated story content using English as fallback with marked translated fields.
frontend/src/lib/uiPolish.ts: Defines shared UI styling constants for sizing, spacing, layout, transitions, and component presets.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for detecting preview mode and encoding or decoding category IDs for URLs.
frontend/src/lib/userProfileStorage.ts: Handles guest profile persistence in localStorage with migration from older formats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: Renders the About Us page with basic project information and a back button.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesTab.tsx: Displays a grid of categories with cover images and navigation handling, respecting kids mode and translations.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryDetail.tsx: Displays stories for a decoded category ID with loading states and a back button.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesTab.tsx: Shows the user’s favorited stories or an empty state if none are saved.
frontend/src/pages/GoPremium.tsx: Renders premium plan selection, benefits, and subscription flow with simulated processing.
frontend/src/pages/HelpAndSupport.tsx: Provides help tips, contact info, social links, and a small footer note.
frontend/src/pages/HomeTab.tsx: Shows featured story, categories, continue reading, ads, and latest stories with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PremiumSuccess.tsx: Displays confirmation of premium activation with benefits and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Presents the app’s privacy policy sections including data collection and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileTab.tsx: Manages user profile display, editing, authentication, stats, and user-created stories.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Implements a searchable and sortable story list with filtering, loading states, and StoryCard rendering.
frontend/src/pages/StoryEditor.tsx: Provides a full story creation/editing form with cover upload, read-time calculation, validation, and save logic.
frontend/src/pages/StoryReader.tsx: Displays a story reader with font/background controls, favorites, social actions, offline support, and reading progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditions.ts: Renders static terms and conditions content inside a legal page layout.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, handles updates, triggers reloads, and checks for new versions periodically.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, safelist classes, plugins, and color variables.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, known issues, required image assets, and existing feature fixes related to modes, stories, social actions, and profile fields. Serves as a configuration and tracking record for the project's current fix requests and features.
